snippet: A seemingly spectacular catch on fourth down late in the game by the Cowboys’ Dez Bryant was overturned, helping to seal the Packers’ 26-21 victory on Sunday.
abstract: Ruling on catch by Dallas Cowboys receiver Dez Bryant in final minutes of playoff game is reversed after challenge by Green Bay Packers' coach Mike McCarthy; call, which leads to narrow victory by Packers, is made based on close reading of process rules.
lead_paragraph: A seemingly spectacular catch on fourth down late in the game by the Cowboys’ Dez Bryant was overturned, helping to seal the Packers’ 26-21 victory on Sunday.

headline.seo: Dez Bryant Play That Was Overturned Momentarily Gave Dallas Hope
headline.main: Catch Is Ruled a Bobble as Dallas’s Good Fortune Turns to Agony
headline.print_headline: Catch Is Ruled a Bobble as Dallas’s Good Fortune Turns to Agony
